meanings.definition: A female servant who performs domestic duties.
meanings.sent1: The maidservant cleaned the entire house diligently.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother used to work as a maidservant in a big mansion.
meanings.sent3: The maidservant accidentally spilled water while mopping the floor, creating a mini indoor pool.
meanings.sent4: She was the maidservant of the household, but her loyalty made her the guardian of their secrets.
meanings.sent5: The maidservant's cheerful demeanor brightened up the gloomy atmosphere of the mansion.

meanings.definition: A woman who is employed to do housework.
meanings.sent1: The kind maidservant helped with cooking and cleaning every day.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family hired a maidservant to assist with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept trying to steal the maidservant's feather duster.
meanings.sent4: She was a maidservant by profession, but her heart belonged to the garden she tended.
meanings.sent5: The maidservant's dedication to her work earned her the respect of the entire household.
